Hello,with your problems I would recommend that you discuss with your doctor about starting on insulin (this is the correct approach if triple therapy is not achieving the desired blood sugar control).Insulin always works and it can give you excellent blood sugar control (after a steep learning curve).  This will also help with your other issues such as neuropathy.Is Cholestipol as statin drug?  Statin drugs are known to worsen (or even trigger) diabetes.   So this may be the culprit.Let us know how you go.
